channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street lights not working, 29th September
item.description:
Street light all along kevington drive do not come on when it’s dark making it dangerous to walk along without a torch

item.title: Installation of Bin, 29th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Argyle Way, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Weeds everywhere, 29th September
item.description:
Weeds all along this street. Constantly gets left until I complain. Can this be done on a regular basis without constant reminders please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Argyle Way, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish everywhere, 29th September
item.description:
All along Argyle Way from both ends there is litter and rubbish everywhere. A bin from removed from one end where it comes out into Rotherhithe New Road. Could this be replaced because it made a big difference.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Argyle Way, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Glass., 29th September
item.description:
There's been a pile of broken glass right next to the park bench on the corner of Viewlands road now for about 2 weeks. Very dangerous for animals and children if they should fall onto it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Viewland Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling on the pavement which is in front of 93 Fernhead Road. 93 Fernhead Road is in Fordingley Road., 29th September
item.description:
Yesterday I reported to you about :"Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is in front of 93 Fernhead Road". 93 Fernhead Road is in Fordingley Road. The fouling is on the pavement which is in front of 93 Fernhead Road. 93 Fernhead is in Fordingley Road. And there is wet dog fouling besides a tree which is in front of 95 Fernhead Road. People get in and out their cars besides this tree and people cross the road besides this tree and children play near this tree. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Every single morning !, 29th September
item.description:
All of this is from the chip shop , curry shop , sun tanning place and tenants above these shops . Absolutely disgusting ..can a large Biffa bin be put in place .?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Newmarket Green, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 29th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Chaucer Road, Albany Park, London
